/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a serene park, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. A winding path, like a ribbon, meanders through the heart of the park, inviting visitors to explore its tranquil beauty. The path is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the ground. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall calmness of the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
